reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thornton's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen makes complex concepts easy to understand and provides practical examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent course content, but Dr. Williams could improve on her presentation skills and student engagement.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson's passion for history is contagious. His lectures are like time travel experiences!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez runs a challenging course, but her explanations are clear and she's always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee seems knowledgeable, but his teaching style is confusing and he rarely answers student questions clearly.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's enthusiasm for literature is inspiring. Her classes are thought-provoking and encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson knows his subject well, but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts to non-physics majors.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's classes are eye-opening. She encourages healthy debates and brings current events into discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia makes economics fascinating! His real-world examples and clear explanations are extremely helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Her passion for the subject is evident.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's course is informative, but his lectures can be dry at times. More interactive sessions would help.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is an excellent educator. Her field trips and hands-on experiments make learning both fun and memorable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Adams challenges students to think critically. His Socratic method of teaching is highly effective.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's course material is interesting, but her grading seems arbitrary and feedback is often unclear.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Chang brings his industry experience into the classroom, making his courses both practical and insightful.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Watson's enthusiasm for neuroscience is infectious. Her lectures are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov is clearly knowledgeable, but his teaching pace is sometimes too fast for beginners to follow.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Green's classes are a perfect blend of theory and fieldwork. Her approach to teaching is truly inspiring.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's practical approach to engineering problems is excellent. His industry connections are a great asset.
